articles.author: Brandon Specktor
articles.title: 'Closest view' yet of interstellar comet 3I/ATLAS captured by Mars orbiter - Live Science
articles.description: The European Space Agency's ExoMars orbiter has captured the closest view yet of the interstellar comet 3I/ATLAS. The images reveal the comet's bright coma but show no signs of a tail.
articles.content:
Two spacecraft on Mars have captured new images of the interstellar comet 3I/ATLAS
 in the closest view that the European Space Agency (ESA) will get of the mysterious object, according to an ESA st… [+3770 chars]
